titleInfo.title: ‘A Plan of the Backwater of Rassulkyma with the Soundings off the Entrance by Lieut.t Brucks’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:302 x 472 mm, on sheet 370 x 536 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Depths shown by soundings.Hand drawn nautical chart of the shores of the Persian Gulf compiled from the survey carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers in 1822 showing Rassulkyma [Ras al-Khaimah]. The buildings in Mana village and ruins of Rassulkyma shown pictorially with the location of Western Tower marked.Includes note with remarks on water levels.
